head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths ROSSLER, ALAN CHARLES

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths ROSSLER, ALAN CHARLES

block.p: ROSSLER-Alan Charles. On August 4, 2000. Beloved husband of Helen (nee Noonan). Cherished father of Anne Marie Robertson (son-in-law Charles Robertson), Peter Rossler, Stephen Rossler and devoted grandfather of Andrew Robertson. Mass of Christian burial St. Michael's Church, 765 Coop City Blvd, Bronx, Monday, August 7, 10AM. Reposing at the McGrath Funeral Home, Bronxville 914-337-6770, Saturday 7-9, Sunday 2-5 and 7-9PM. Contributions may be made in lieu of flowers to a charity of your choice.
